content: adorable little crochet butterflies that work great from appliques hair accessories magnets and more the pattern includes step by step written and photo instructions you ll love making different color combos with your scrap yarn and will have a pile of butterflies before you know it this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product skill level easy sizes approx 3 75 wide by 2 5 tall hook size h/8 5 0 mm yarn samples used category 5 bulky yarn stitches chain slip_stitch puff st single_crochet pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that this pattern is available for free on stitching-together com 1 1 https //www stitching-together com/crochet-butterfly-pattern/
